markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Traveler's Transit](/Spells.aspx?ID=1839)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 379 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=93)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You add power to your muscles, allowing you to swim or climb walls with ease. When you Cast this Spell, you gain either a climb Speed or a swim Speed. The Speed is equal to your land Speed.

---
**Heightened (5th)** You can choose to gain a fly Speed.
name: Traveler's Transit

text: Traveler's Transit Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 379 2.0 Domain Travel Duration 5 minutes --- You add power to your muscles, allowing you to swim or climb walls with ease. When you Cast this Spell, you gain either a climb Speed or a swim Speed. The Speed is equal to your land Speed. --- Heightened (5th) You can choose to gain a fly Speed.
